title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog
description: When performing a search via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are returned. This issue was encountered during the 1GLDN1X session.
OB: The search functionality in the Package view selection and dialog does not return any results.
EB: The search functionality in the Package view selection and dialog should return the expected results.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the Package view in the application.
2. Select a package.
3. Open the search dialog.
4. Enter the search criteria.
5. Click on the search button.
6. Check if the search results are displayed correctly.

Note: The search functionality via the context menu in the packages view is working correctly.
